result.markdown:
--- title: "In-class_Ex08" format: html editor: visual --- # Loading packages and data Code chunk: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(igraph, tidygraph, ggraph, visNetwork, lubridate, clock, tidyverse, graphlayouts) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_nodes <- read_csv("data/GAStech_email_node.csv") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Rows: 54 Columns: 4 ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr (3): label, Department, Title dbl (1): id ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges <- read_csv("data/GAStech_email_edge-v2.csv") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Rows: 9063 Columns: 8 ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr (5): SentDate, Subject, MainSubject, sourceLabel, targetLabel dbl (2): source, target time (1): SentTime ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. ``` ::: ::: # Data Wrangling ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges <- GAStech_edges %>% mutate(SendDate = dmy(SentDate)) %>% mutate(Weekday = wday(SentDate, label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges_aggregated <- GAStech_edges %>% filter(MainSubject == "Work related") %>% group_by(source, target, Weekday) %>% summarise(Weight = n()) %>% filter(source!=target) %>% filter(Weight > 1) %>% ungroup() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `summarise()` has grouped output by 'source', 'target'. You can override using the `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ::: # Create network objects ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_graph <- tbl_graph(nodes = GAStech_nodes, edges = GAStech_edges_aggregated, directed = TRUE) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_graph %>% activate(edges) %>% arrange(desc(Weight)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tbl_graph: 54 nodes and 1372 edges # # A directed multigraph with 1 component # # Edge Data: 1,372 × 4 (active) from to Weekday Weight 1 40 41 Saturday 13 2 41 43 Monday 11 3 35 31 Tuesday 10 4 40 41 Monday 10 5 40 43 Monday 10 6 36 32 Sunday 9 # … with 1,366 more rows # # Node Data: 54 × 4 id label Department Title 1 1 Mat.Bramar Administration Assistant to CEO 2 2 Anda.Ribera Administration Assistant to CFO 3 3 Rachel.Pantanal Administration Assistant to CIO # … with 51 more rows ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggraph(GAStech_graph) + geom_edge_link() + geom_node_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Using "stress" as default layout ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Using the `size` aesthetic in this geom was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0. ℹ Please use `linewidth` in the `default_aes` field and elsewhere instead. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex08_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes()) + geom_node_point(aes()) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex08_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes()) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department, size = 3)) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in grid.Call(C_stringMetric, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label)): font family not found in Windows font database Warning in grid.Call(C_stringMetric, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label)): font family not found in Windows font database ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) g + facet_edges(~Weekday) ``` ::: {.cell-output ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- GAStech_graph %>% mutate(community = as.factor(group_edge_betweenness(weights = Weight, directed = TRUE))) %>% ggraph(layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = community)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in cluster_edge_betweenness(graph = .G(), weights = weights, directed = directed): At core/community/edge_betweenness.c:492 : Membership vector will be selected based on the highest modularity score. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in cluster_edge_betweenness(graph = .G(), weights = weights, directed = directed): At core/community/edge_betweenness.c:497 : Modularity calculation with weighted edge betweenness community detection might not make sense -- modularity treats edge weights as similarities while edge betwenness treats them as distances. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : font family not found in Windows font database database Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : font family not found in Windows font database ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex08_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: # Interactive Network graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges_aggregated <- GAStech_edges %>% left_join(GAStech_nodes, by = c("sourceLabel" = "label")) %>% rename(from = id) %>% left_join(GAStech_nodes, by = c("targetLabel" = "label")) %>% rename(to = id) %>% filter(MainSubject == "Work related") %>% group_by(from, to) %>% summarise(weight = n()) %>% filter(from!=to) %>% filter(weight > 1) %>% ungroup() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `summarise()` has grouped output by 'from'. You can override using the `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") %>% visLegend() %>% visLayout(randomSeed = 123) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") %>% visEdges(arrows = "to", smooth = list(enabled = TRUE, type = "curvedCW")) %>% visLegend() %>% visLayout(randomSeed = 123) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
